price: Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Allah Yã taimake ku a cikin wurãre mãsu yawa, da Rãnar Hunainu,* a lõkacin da yawanku ya bã ku sha'awa, sai bai amfãnar da ku da kõme ba, kuma ƙasa ta yi ƙunci a kanku da yalwarta, sa'an nan kuma kuka jũya kunã mãsu bãyar da bãya.
arabic: لَقَدۡ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فِي مَوَاطِنَ كَثِيرَةٖ وَيَوۡمَ حُنَيۡنٍ إِذۡ أَعۡجَبَتۡكُمۡ كَثۡرَتُكُمۡ فَلَمۡ تُغۡنِ عَنكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَضَاقَتۡ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتۡ ثُمَّ وَلَّيۡتُم مُّدۡبِرِينَ
footnotes: * Hunainu wani wãdi ne a tsakãnin Makka da Ɗã'ifa inda Musulmi suka yi yãƙi da Hawãzinãwa, a cikin Shawwal shekara ta takwas. Yawan Musulmi ya rũɗe su har suka ce: "Yau bã zã a rinjãye mu ba, sabõda ƙaranci." Yawansu yã kasance dubũ gõma sha biyu, kuma kãfirai dubũ huɗu, sai suka ji tsõro, suka gudu, suka bar Annabi a kan alfadararsa Baidã'a, bãbu kõwa tãre da shĩ fãce Abbas da Abu Sufyãna wanda yake riƙe da likkãfar Annabi. Annabi ya sanya Abbas ya yi ta kiran su,"Yã Ansãr! Ya Mũhajirũn!" Har suka kõmo aka ci Nasara.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad naṣarakumu al-lahu fī mawāṭina kathīratin wayawma ḥunaynin idh aʿjabatkum kathratukum falam tugh'ni ʿankum shayan waḍāqat ʿalaykumu al-arḍu bimā raḥubat thumma wallaytum mud'birīna
